oai_dc:dc.dc:title: U.S. Mail Coach, 1855
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: United States Mail Coach. All Baggage At the Risk of Its Owner. Aug. (?) 26, 1855. Lists Passenger's Names, No., Where From, Where To, Fare, By Whom. Includes etching of mail coach and two hand drawn coaches or buggies below. Three passengers listed (McAdoo, Shepard, Guther(?)). MM-2008-005
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mail wagons;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
